name: Hydration Hunt
description:
Hydration hunt is inspired by this game from Tencent called steal the buns  - (抢包子)  The objective is to collect and steal resources to keep the character alive, and those unique abilities given to the characters are there to create conflict for your opponents from collecting water.

                                                                               Steal the buns (QQ tencent)                                           

                                                          - Left joystick to move character

                                                          - Triangle for special attack

                                                          - Square for standard attack

                                                          - Circle for dash

My role for this game is character design:

                    Character Modeling

                    Character Animation / Rigging (ADSK rig) / Motion Capture

                                                            Sketches and Game Ideas                                  

  BabyCastles - NYC (Initial playtest)

  

                      Spreadsheet that keeps game elements and progress organized                                                                                Playtest Thursday - NYU (Final playtest)

Characters - Artist - Harris Tsui

                                                   * All Creations are Original

                                                   * First year production
